call_title: Ergo POW Blockchain Weekly Update & AMA - July 25th 2024

topics.title: Sigmanauts Mining Pool Storage Rent Integration
topics.summary: QX reports successful testnet node setup with help from mgPai for testing storage rent collection. The Sigmanauts mining pool aims to become the first pool to collect storage rent rewards for miners.

topics.title: Sigmanauts Revenue Strategy and Treasury Status
topics.summary: QX outlines the core mission to establish revenue streams for Sigmanauts sustainability. With 11,000 ERG remaining from initial grants, they're pursuing mining pool profits, SigmaLock product development, and raffle UI services as revenue sources.

topics.title: SigmaLock Token Vesting Platform Development
topics.summary: Detailed explanation of SigmaLock, a token locking service for life insurance, vested payments, and ICO launches. Users can lock tokens with NFT-based unlocking and optional fail-safes for early release.

topics.title: mgPai Joins Ergo Foundation Board
topics.summary: CannonQ congratulates mgPai on joining the Ergo Foundation as a board member. QX expresses concern about retaining talented developers who receive offers from other chains like Alephium.

topics.title: EF Monthly Grant Program Launch
topics.summary: Discussion of the Ergo Foundation's new monthly grant program with $10,000 monthly cap for marketing proposals. ADA Orca from Cardano has already submitted a proposal, and The Long Road project received initial funding.

topics.title: Cyberverse Gaming Engagement and Events
topics.summary: CannonQ shares enthusiasm about Cyberverse gameplay improvements and community engagement. The game consistently has 30+ active players and successful poker nights with 66 participants, featuring voice chat coordination.

topics.title: DuckPools Yield Farming Growth
topics.summary: DuckPools has reached nearly 400k total value locked despite being in beta with limited pools. CannonQ recommends users consider depositing 10-33% of their ERG holdings for yield generation.

topics.title: Hummingbot Arbitrage Integration with Spectrum
topics.summary: Rosen Bridge team successfully modified Hummingbot to include Spectrum DEX for automated arbitrage. This self-custodial solution addresses community concerns about giving cloud services access to exchange wallets.

topics.title: Community Spending Behavior and Ecosystem Support
topics.summary: QX addresses the community's tendency to hoard ERG rather than spend on ecosystem projects. He emphasizes that supporting projects with token purchases is essential for attracting new developers and demonstrating ecosystem viability.

topics.title: Mining Pool Bonus Rewards System
topics.summary: Explanation of Sigmanauts mining pool's bonus token distribution system with 15-16 hourly injections. Pool distributes donated tokens from various projects plus 100 ERG monthly from Sigmanauts treasury.

topics.title: Developer Documentation Gap Discussion
topics.summary: Community discussion about lack of Ergo documentation for developers. QX suggests grant proposals for documentation work and mentions FleetSDK as next documentation release, while acknowledging ErgPy needs better tutorials.

topics.title: Proton Wallet Integration Possibility
topics.summary: Discussion of potential Ergo integration with Proton's new Bitcoin wallet, which allows sending to email addresses. The privacy-focused approach would align well with Ergo's privacy-as-choice philosophy.

topics.title: Keystone Hardware Wallet Integration Progress
topics.summary: mgPai is working on Ergo integration for Keystone hardware wallets after meetings with their team. QX plans to submit Sigmanauts proposal to fund mgPai's development work on the integration.

topics.title: EF Grant Framework Response to Community Drama
topics.summary: Following internal community drama about marketing, the Ergo Foundation formalized their grant proposal framework. This gives projects and individuals clear process for requesting funding for development and marketing initiatives.

topics.title: Exchange Partnership Deposit/Withdrawal Negotiations
topics.summary: CannonQ updates on exchange partnership negotiations, emphasizing the requirement for full deposit/withdrawal functionality. The Sigmanauts are taking a firm stance that the community won't use platforms without proper custody options.

topics.title: Cornell University Blockchain Sponsorship and Workshops
topics.summary: QX completed wire payment for Cornell blockchain sponsorship and is planning Ergo workshops with developers like kushti. The initiative aims to change young people's perception of crypto through education and potential hackathons.

topics.title: Fiat OnRamp Integration Research
topics.summary: QX is exploring fiat onramp solutions through letsexchange.io and Switch Here, currently available in Canada/South America. Plans include integrating both ERG and Rosen token purchasing, with potential wallet API integration for Nautilus.
